data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=UChiWUkTA4YQ7kNvgHGysYR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBE5O_OaQ6tQRlnnFBxr22wmydEKbl3iNR1LvQUD0SCCA&oe=66CB13B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PXBIkkTUHT0Q7kNvgHNNYkp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD2LTqtgOpZz1dKcnnSKY3MXHd3RWMCbD72B8Mpl64c9w&oe=66CB2152)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=heCBevrIC_wQ7kNvgHpdF0b&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDIaAeI6Ai59q3DbE4lB6RjOxfib41lIe-odJ2OgUbV0w&oe=66CB0C89)
